app.title: Commission Calculator
app.description: Calculate your sales commissions easily and quickly.
calculator.title: Commission Calculator
calculator.errors.invalid_sales_descript: Please enter a positive sales value. Use a period for decimals.
calculator.errors.invalid_rate_descripti: The rate must be between 0 and 100. Use a period for decimals.
calculator.errors.invalid_month_descript: Please enter the month in MM/YYYY format.
table.title: Commission Table
table.item.delete_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete this item from the table? This action cannot be undone.
table.clear_confirm_step1_description: This action will permanently delete all {{count}} items from your table. It will not be possible to recover them. Are you sure you want to continue?
table.clear_confirm_step2_description: To confirm the permanent deletion of the entire table, please type <1>delete all</1> in the field below.
table.errors.cannot_save_description: The current calculation is not valid or is incomplete.
table.errors.empty_table_description: There is no data to export.
table.calculation_saved_description: The result has been added to the table.
table.item_removed_description: The calculation was removed from the table.
table.table_cleared_description: All calculations were removed from the table.
table.seller_updated_description: The seller's name was changed in the table.
table.month_updated_description: The month was changed in the table.
csv.export_success_description: The CSV file has been downloaded.
csv.export_fail_description: Your browser does not support direct export.
privacy.title: Privacy Notice
privacy.description: This site does not store your personal data on external servers. All information entered is processed and saved locally in your browser (using LocalStorage) for your convenience. No data is shared.
errors.load_data_description: Could not load settings or table.
history_tab.description_deprecated: This tab is from a previous version and is not used in the current calculator. The history is displayed on the main interface.
history_tab.main_interface_info: The history is displayed on the main interface.
